---
# Create a custom listing component for recent posts
listing:
  contents: posts
  sort: "date desc"
  type: grid
  grid-columns: 3
  image-height: 200px
  max-items: 3
  categories: false
  sort-ui: false
  filter-ui: false
  fields: [image, date, title, author, description]
---

```{=html}
<div class="recent-posts-listing">
  <div class="listing-title">Recent Posts</div>
  <div class="listing-description">Explore my latest research, tutorials, and insights</div>
</div>
```

::: {#listing-recent}
:::
